translated: If a monk, out of disrespect, teaches the Teaching to someone lying down who is not sick, even if it is just on the palm of a hand, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
There is no offense if he does not intend to do it; if he is the first offender; if he is insane; if he is the first offender.
The fourth training rule is finished.
